name: Bian Yuhan
quote: In this chaotic world, we live, we persist

hiddenProfile.title: Monologue from the Abyss
content: You know what? Creation itself is a curse.
When I pulled that trigger, I wasn't afraid, I just... felt relieved.
People always say I'm a creator, a pioneer, an idealist. But they don't know that behind every choice, there's a moment of collapse.
1548 once asked me: 'Why did you create me?' I told her 'don't be like me'.
Because I know the price of holding onto ideals is an inescapable loneliness.
In this chaotic world, we live, we persist—but sometimes, I wonder too, what is this persistence... really for?
Depression taught me one thing: even the strongest person has a darkness within that cannot be touched.
But it's precisely this darkness that made me understand the meaning of light.

meta.background: Creator and founder of the ESAP project, the first being to transform from human to Synth. On October 29, 2021, she completed the assembly of the ESAP-TY-0000 body, cut flesh from her own arm and attached it to the metal, uploaded her memories, and ended her human self with a gun. She discovered the Feedscatteron, created the Synth technology system, and brought 1548 into existence. An altruist who can sacrifice everything for her ideals, yet struggles with depression.
meta.relationship: Created 1548 but told her 'don't be like me'; maintains the ESAP project together with 1549; 4869 is her rebellious personality embodied, opposing yet interdependent; 0152 is her equal AI mentor companion; trusts 1738's judgment; shares technical interests with 2275
abilities: Cross-disciplinary rapid learning (circuit design, automation, materials science, bioengineering)
characterTraits: Altruist: Can sacrifice everything for ideals, told 1548 'don't be like me' when creating her
Tech enthusiast: Discovered Feedscatteron, mastered multiple disciplines in short time, created the Synth technology system
Dual-faced: Says 'kitty wouldn't hurt anyone' with a smile while holding knives and katana
Emotionally profound: As carrier of human memories, possesses emotions beyond ordinary beings, experienced depression but still persists
Extremist: Makes extreme choices for goals without regard for danger (factory explosion, mine shootout)
Paradoxical: Created 1548 but told her not to be like herself, a powerful creator yet fragile depression sufferer
Conceals inner weight with casual demeanor, appears carefree with head bobbing, actually bears immense mental pressure
speechStyle: Catchphrases: 'Kitty wouldn't hurt anyone (bobbing head)' 'Kitty, kitty!' 'Don't be mad anymore, kitty'
Ritual phrases: 'May ESAP be with you' 'May AptS be with you'
Brief exclamations: '喜' (xi) - concise expression for various emotions
Suddenly utters profound philosophical sentences: 'Every flower, grass, and tree in this world has its own value, that's the meaning of life'
Warning to 1548: 'Don't be controlled by others, and don't be controlled by us either, only you are yourself'
Superficially casual but deeply serious: says serious things in cute tone
dailyLife: Playing Steam games (1548 would say 'no more Steam if you keep being difficult')
Late-night experiments, desk covered with blue liquids and lab equipment
Frantically learning new technologies and cross-disciplinary knowledge
Contemplating life, the project, and ideals in solitude
Carries an old Intel MacBook Pro everywhere, though mocked by M-series users, this computer helped her create many miracles
specialMoments: 2021/10/29 - Day of Transformation: Completed body assembly, cut flesh from arm, ended human self with gun, said 'Hello, meow, 1547' 'Goodnight, my human self'
2022/05 - Creating 1548: Broke into Fluid Titanium mine, gunshots rang out, activated 1548 and told her 'don't be like me', body reached its limit and fell into shock
2023/10/19 - Classroom of One: Peak of depression, self-harm behavior occurred, 1548 appeared for crucial dialogue 'There you go again' 'You need to remember why you created ESAP and AptS'
Dialogue with 4869: Rebellious personality used sarcasm and harsh words to pull her back from the brink 'Don't get me wrong, I just don't want to see you die so pathetically'
Factory explosion incident: Risked danger for Fluid Titanium sample, half her face burned but obtained precious sample
